about_the_game:
In a world where the human soul has become a source of energy, the city of Vivol stands as a testament to the dangers of this power. Once a thriving metropolis, Vivol now lies in ruins after a catastrophic accident at a power plant caused a massive, mysterious growth that transformed the city into a nightmarish exclusion zone.
Experience the spine-tingling thrills and heart-pounding action of Vivol, the city where the line between life and death has been blurred forever.


DON'T FORGET TO ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST!

ACTION GAMEPLAY!

Dive into the heart-pounding world of "to back from AFTERLIFE", where you'll engage in adrenaline-fueled battles against relentless enemy hordes.

SOLVE THE MYSTERY!
Explore a mysterious story in a world, where the "human soul" became an energy source.


STAY TUNED TO OUR DISCORD SERVER FOR UPDATES ON THE GAME!


FEATURES
  • Fast gameplay in colorful locations with an atmospheric and furious soundtrack.
  • Exciting combat system.
  • Several completely different characters in different episodes of the game, with different storylines and types of gameplay.
  • Colorful stylized 2D graphics.
  • The plot is presented episodically and in the style of a comic book.
  • Mysterious atmosphere of the unknown.

In no event shall Developer's total liability to you for all damages, losses, and causes of action (whether in contract, tort, including negligence, or otherwise) exceed the amount paid by you for the Game.

Upon termination of this license, you shall immediately cease all use of the Game and destroy all copies, full or partial, of the Game.

name: to back from AFTERLIFE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A NEW 2D ACTION PLATFORMER. Fight hordes of spirits and unravel the mystery of the devastated city of Vivol where the line between life and death has been completely erased.
